# dns_ptr_record_set (Data Source)

Use this data source to get DNS PTR record set of the ip address.

## Example Usage

```typescript
// DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
import { Construct } from "constructs";
import { TerraformOutput, TerraformStack } from "cdktf";
/*
 * Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
 * See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
 */
import { DataDnsPtrRecordSet } from "./.gen/providers/dns/data-dns-ptr-record-set";
class MyConvertedCode extends TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const hashicorp = new DataDnsPtrRecordSet(this, "hashicorp", {
      ipAddress: "8.8.8.8",
    });
    new TerraformOutput(this, "hashi_ptr", {
      value: hashicorp.ptr,
    });
  }
}

```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ipAddress` (String) IP address to look up.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Always set to the IP address.
- `ptr` (String) A PTR record associated with `ipAddress`.
